titleStmt.title: The Second, fourth, and seventh satyrs of Monsieur Boileau imitated with some other poems and translations, written upon several occasions.
titleStmt.author: Boileau Despréaux, Nicolas, 1636-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Sare ... and H. Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Authorship uncertain; has been attributed to N. Borleau Despréaux. Cf. Madan; Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
